quest.name: In a Manor of Spooking
journal:
An investigator for the Adventurers' Guild appears in need of assistance.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

An investigator from the Adventurers' Guild has asked your help in uncovering the nefarious plans of the Continental Circus─a troupe of mischievous fiends disguised as entertainers. Approach the illusionist in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, and learn what you can of their impending devilry.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Suspiciously eager to accept your offer of aid, the Continental Circus illusionist asks that you help prepare for the opening of their haunted manor. Your tasks will take you to the Goldsmiths' Guild in Ul'dah, the Culinarians' Guild in Limsa Lominsa, and the Carpenters' Guild in Gridania.
You have collected the commissions, and spoken with the distracted circus member. Return to the illusionist in Old Gridania and deliver the requested items.

You hand over the commissions to the waiting illusionist. She bids you wait in the area for your reward whilst she is busy organizing the final preparations. Almost immediately following this exchange however, a mysterious voice urges you to visit the place where they “work the hides of dead things” if you care for the fate of the living...

You linger outside the Leatherworkers' Guild, not sure what to expect, when you witness the arrival of the illusionist. She is soon joined by the Impresario, and, after checking to see that they are alone, they both revert to their true impish forms. They proceed to discuss their plans for the haunted manor, and of how the terror they induce within its walls will be used to call down a new Night of Devilry. Return to the investigator near the amphitheatre and report this vile scheme.

Once he has digested the details of the imps' plans, the investigator is quick to proffer a solution: convince the people that the horrors within the manor are clever illusions so that their fear will be replaced with amusement. Wishing to know more of what waits inside the haunted house, the investigator then requests that you conduct a thorough investigation of its ghostly halls. Speak once more with the illusionist, and gain entrance to the manor.

After thanking you for your assistance with the preparations, the illusionist suggests that you pay a visit to a harlequin guide if you wish to enter the haunted house. Find one of the informative circus members in either the amphitheatre or the Acorn Orchard, and learn the nature of the manor's “amusements.” Once you have explored its ghastly rooms, return to the Adventurers' Guild investigator with the evidence of your experience.

You explain to the investigator how the amusements inside the manor were designed to instill fear in unsuspecting visitors. He examines one of the cookies you earned from enduring the entertainment, and is grudgingly impressed by the imps' diabolical plan. Upon witnessing the jubilant reactions of a mother and her child after their return from the haunted house, however, the guild member concludes that his rumors have had their intended effect. And fortunately, it seems that the circus members are none the wiser for your interference.
Once more the mysterious voice reaches your ears, and commends you for preserving the joyful atmosphere of All Saints' Wake...
objectives: Speak with Jemime at the Goldsmiths' Guild.
Speak with the distracted harlequin at the Culinarians' Guild.
Speak with Corgg at the Carpenters' Guild.
Deliver the grotesque candelabras and pumpkin lanterns to the enthralling illusionist.
Lie in wait at the designated location.
Report to the Adventurers' Guild investigator.
Obtain a pumpkin cookie from the Haunted Manor, and present it to the Adventurers' Guild investigator.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: My pardon, but you wouldn't happen to be an adventurer, would you? I'm with the Adventurers' Guild myself, and would welcome some assistance if you've the time. I'll try to be brief.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Are you familiar with the Continental Circus? It's a troupe of performers who visit Eorzea's cities around this time every year, obstensibly to add an extra dash of revelry to the All Saints' Wake celebrations.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: What we've kept largely a secret, however, is that these entertaining folk are not any kind of folk at all! They are, in fact, a group of imps and other monstrous beings who employ transformative magicks to alter their appearance.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: As long as they cause no trouble, we're unwilling to unmask them and ruin the festivities. But these are voidsent, after all─'twould be foolish not to keep a close eye on their activities.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: And that's where I've run into difficulties. They've grown wise to my observations, and slip away whenever I approach too closely. Do you think that you might aid me with my surveillance?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Splendid! From what I've managed to ascertain, the circus is recruiting volunteers to help with festival preparations.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Offer your services to the Auri illusionist over there in the amphitheatre, and learn exactly what these fiends are planning.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Should their intentions prove nefarious, then pray report back to me with all haste!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Pray speak with the Auri illusionist in the amphitheatre. Pretend to cooperate with her requests, and uncover any mischief that might be afoot. I shall wait here until you return!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text:
Greetings from the Continental Circus!
We─ Have we met before!? (You mortals all look alike to me...) Ahem!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Greetings from the Continental Circus! We shall make mischief with our masquerades below, even as the saints feast up above!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Our main attraction this year is an authentically spine-chilling haunted house. This will be an All Saints' Wake to remember, I promise you!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: ...Or at least it will be once we have the mansion properly decorated. I'm afraid the preparations are taking rather longer than we anticipated.

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: As a matter of fact, I've been on the lookout for willing victim─ Er, volunteers!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Every helper will be rewarded with an open invitation to our monstrous manor. You'll be able to visit over and over, completely free of charge! An irresistible offer, yes?

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Consider yourself recruited, then! As for your tasks, they are mostly a matter of collecting commissions from laboriously distant locations.

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Your first chore will take you to the Goldsmiths' Guild in Ul'dah. We ordered some gorgeously gruesome candelabras, but neglected to organize their delivery...

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: The second will involve a journey to the Bismarck in Limsa Lominsa. I sent one of our junior members to pick up a batch of seasonal cookies, and now I thoroughly regret the decision. Pray visit the Culinarians' Guild and see what is taking the flighty fool so long.

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: The third and final task is also the closest: you need only walk into the Carpenters' Guild here in Gridania and collect the lanterns we requested. Simply mention decorations for the haunted house, and the receptionist should understand.

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Naught too complicated, I trust? Off you skitter, then!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: We must have the proper atmosphere if the manor is to have the desired...effect. Hurry back with those commissions!

dialogue.name: JEMIME
dialogue.text: You've come for the Continental Circus commission? Very good. I have them right here for you.

dialogue.name: MEMBERB01548
dialogue.text: Ah, I see─you must allow the butter and eggs to reach room temperature before mixing! This cooking business is almost as complex as spellcasting!

dialogue.name: MEMBERB01548
dialogue.text: ...Hm? What is it?

dialogue.name: MEMBERB01548
dialogue.text: Oh, bubbling brimstone, the cookies! I was so caught up in learning recipes, I lost track of the time! The mistress will have my wings!

dialogue.name: CHARLYS
dialogue.text: Sir! You dropped your─ <sigh> What an odd gentleman.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Inducing mortal terror: a list of manor decorations.

dialogue.name: CORGG
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, one of our more unusual commissions. I hope the lantern design is to your liking!

dialogue.name: JEMIME
dialogue.text: When the thespians placed their order, they left us a gift of this adorable lantern. I think I'll keep it on display until the end of All Saints' Wake.

dialogue.name: CHARLYS
dialogue.text: It's wonderful when our customers show an interest in culinary technique, but I've never met anyone so obsessed with cookies...

dialogue.name: CORGG
dialogue.text: Were the lanterns sufficiently eerie? Our artisans rather enjoyed the idea of making decorations for All Saints' Wake!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: How did you fare? Were all our commissions ready for collection?

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Wonderful, thank you! Now we can put the finishing touches on our haunted house!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Let's discuss your reward once I've handed these things over to our workers. I shan't be long, so don't scamper too far away!

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text: (-Disembodied Voice-)Heh heh heh... Know you the place where they work the hides of dead things? I suggest you wait there and watch if you would safeguard the souls of the living.

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Why don't you go for a wander, and take in the festive sights? I shall return soon with word of your reward.

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: (-Enthralling Illusionist-)...Impresario? Are you there?

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: That overly curious mortal remains by his tree, I trust?

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: You have done well. The fools will flock to our “haunted” manor, believing it a harmless attraction. And when they realize the true nature of the horrors within, their fear shall be exquisite!

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: Like flies to excrement, our malevolent kin shall be drawn in droves by the stench of mortal terror. Once more shall this realm's cities be darkened by the Night of Devilry!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: (-Enthralling Illusionist-)A brilliant plan, Impresario! We shall reap a harvest of dread behind a facade of innocent revelry!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: (-Enthralling Illusionist-)All is in readiness! We have but to throw open the doors and invite our prey inside...

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: The Night of Devilry, you say!?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Legend has it that on such a night, a pumpkin-headed fiend raises an army of terrible demons and wreaks unimaginable havoc upon the cities of mortals...

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Nay, we cannot allow them to succeed with this fearful harvest of theirs.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: ...Ah, I have it!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: I shall spread word to all and sundry that the horrors they may experience within this haunted manor are mere illusion─clever magicks meant to enhance the atmosphere, and naught more!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Should folk enter the house with such expectations, then they are far more likely to be entertained than terrified.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Pray gather some few companions and conduct an advance exploration of the manor. I would know what tricks the imps plan that we might better spin them into treats.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Once you have traversed their ghostly halls, report back here to me!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: The haunted manor awaits! ...Was there something else? Surely an adventurer with your training could not possibly be scared, could you?

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: There were a few other matters to attend to, but our preparations are now in order! I─ Why do you stare at me so?

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Ahem. Well, thanks in great part to your assistance, we are ready to fling open the doors to our haunted manor!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Before you enter, however, I suggest you speak with one of our harlequin guides─they will explain the various amusements that await you inside!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: You'll find a helpful circus member right here in the amphitheatre, or you might try the Acorn Orchard should you have business in New Gridania. I guarantee your manor experience will be transformative!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Haunted Manor seasonal instance. To enter the manor, speak with the harlequin guide in either Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre or the Acorn Orchard.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Haunted Manor is a light party instance (four players). There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Parties that register for the instance with less than four members will be filled out automatically via the matching system.

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: Still mustering your courage? Speak with one of our harlequin guides when you're ready to brave the manor!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: You've returned from the imps' manor, then? Tell me: what awful evils lurked within?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: ...Cookies? Well, I suppose some might be tempted to face their fears again and again for the promise of more delicious baked goods. And you say they might also be used as currency for other rewards?

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text:
Diabolical...
I thank you for risking your sanity for the greater good. Oh, and pray take this treat away from me ere I succumb to its crumbling sweetness.

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Hark, over there. It seems others have survived their foray into the haunted house. I only hope that my efforts to undermine its terrors were successful...

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: It was a little frightening at first, but the monsters were so much fun! Can we go again, Mama!?

dialogue.name: TDANAFA
dialogue.text: Ahahaha, it all seemed so real, didn't it? The circus folk have certainly outdone themselves this year!

dialogue.name: TMARITAA
dialogue.text: (-Cheerful Girl-)It was a little frightening at first, but the monsters were so much fun! Can we go again, Mama!?

dialogue.name: TDANAFA
dialogue.text: (-Motherly Miqo'te-)Ahahaha, it all seemed so real, didn't it? The circus folk have certainly outdone themselves this year!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: ...Fun? FUN!? They were supposed to be terrified!

dialogue.name: WITCH01548
dialogue.text: I don't understand it. Our members inside the manor report that the more fiendish they behaved, the more the visitors appeared to enjoy themselves...

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: Where did we go wrong? Have these mortals grown numb to fear?

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: ...No, they are sniveling cowards, each and every one. We must simply redouble our efforts! Their terror will fuel our conquest!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: Hah! It seems our interference has gone unnoticed by the imps!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR01548
dialogue.text: I imagine my rumors will spread themselves as more folk visit the manor, but I'll be sure to nudge them in the right direction. Thank you again for your aid!

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text:
Heh heh heh...
All their scheming come to naught. One almost feels sorry for the little devils.

dialogue.name: PUMPKIN
dialogue.text: I found this garb inside the manor, and will leave it here for you, brave mortal. Best are the nights when there is happiness and joy for man and monster both...
